description: Liquid XOXNO (LXOXNO) is the utility and interest-bearing token of the XOXNO Network, a Web3 platform for collectibles, DeFi, and more. LXOXNO is a staked version of the XOXNO token, with its value increasing daily based on network activity. All royalties are paid in LXOXNO, providing an auto-compounding effect for creators. Holding LXOXNO allows users to benefit from the ecosystem's real yield and growing value.
